findings.description: Pressed Enter/Submit after SQL injection payload in search box on /users page.
findings.evidence: Action: Pressed Enter to submit search

ceo_feedback: Only 1 vulnerability found - not impressive scale for a demo; SQL injection is common/expected - lacks sophistication; No demonstration of RL learning/improvement over time; Missing variety of attack vectors (XSS, CSRF, auth bypass); No metrics showing speed vs traditional pentesting; Lacks 'wow moment' - this looks like basic automated scanning
